availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary S. Allen. Father of Sara E. Allen. Laborer in Taylor County in 1860. Private in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 30, 1961 to September 10, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 2, p. 631.
U.S. Registers of Deaths of Volunteers, 1861-1865 Records of the Adjunct General's Office, 1780's-1917, National Archives, Record Group 94, Surname Range: A-K.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866),
